settings.description: Run the Noctalia polkit helper as your session authentication agent.
settings.helper-path-desc: Absolute path to the noctalia-polkit-agent binary.
settings.poll-interval-desc: How frequently the plugin checks for new authentication requests.
settings.auto-open-desc: Show the panel immediately when a request arrives.
settings.auto-close-success-desc: Close the panel after a successful authentication.
settings.auto-close-cancel-desc: Close the panel when a request is cancelled.
